sentence.Network_en: Amateurs fall by the wayside when the going gets tough.
sentence.Network_cn: 业余爱好者遇到困难时往往半途而废。

sentence.Network_en: wild flowers growing by the wayside
We spent the night in a wayside inn.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在一家路边的旅店过夜.

jx.jx_en_mean: To fail to continue; give up.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 半途而废：无法继续；放弃

jx.jx_en_mean: To be set aside or discarded because of other considerations.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 被搁置：出于其它考虑而被搁在一边或被抛弃

entry.def: The wayside is the side of the road.

example.ex: ...groups of men playing cards by lamplight at the wayside.
example.tran: 在路边就着路灯玩牌的一群群人

entry.def: If a person or plan falls by the wayside, they fail or stop before they complete what they set out to do.

example.ex: Amateurs fall by the wayside when the going gets tough...
example.tran: 业余爱好者遇到困难时往往半途而废。

example.ex: In the mid 70s, Morrison planned a comedy album. The project fell by the wayside.
example.tran: 70年代中期莫里森打算出部喜剧专辑。该计划后来夭折了。

means.word_mean: 1. edge of a way or road or path;

auth_sentence.content: How many Obama campaign promises have fallen by the wayside?
auth_sentence.res_content: How many Obama campaign promises have fallen by the wayside?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How many Obama campaign promises have fallen by the wayside?

auth_sentence.content: Mutations either survive or go by the wayside.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mutations either survive or go by the wayside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mutations either survive or go by the wayside.

auth_sentence.content: "Those will go by the wayside, " predicted Sen.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Those will go by the wayside, " predicted Sen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Those will go by the wayside, " predicted Sen.

sentences.en: Local inhabitants display their handicrafts on the wayside.
sentences.cn: 当地居民在路边陈列他们的手工艺品。

sentences.en: We spent the night in a wayside inn.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家路边的旅店过夜。
